content: if you hate dealing with soap slipping out of your hand in the bath or shower then a soap sack is just what you need this soap sack will be approx 5 inches long and 4 inches wide but it will stretch when wet and is lovely and soft for washing any member of a family both quick and easy to make it s an ideal way to use up leftover cotton you could really use any cotton along with the recommended hook size for that yarn obviously the end product may turn out bigger or smaller than this one depending on the hook and yarn used
